sentences.english: It is located in the beautiful Tongxiang City, Zhejiang Province, on a rich plain praised as "homeland of fish and rice".
sentences.chinese: 地址坐落在環境秀美的“魚米之鄉”浙江省桐鄉市。

sentences.english: Xindili site is located at Wanli Village, Liuliang Town, Tongxiang City of Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 新地裏遺址位於浙江省桐鄉市留良鄉灣裏村。

sentences.english: Tongxiang City, known for their "culture of the state" known for a long history, celebrities forth in large numbers.
sentences.chinese: 桐鄉市素以“文化之邦”著稱，源遠流長，名人輩出。
